name: Figgy Artichoke Bites
description: Indulge in this elegant party appie – fresh figs meet creamy artichoke filing for a burst of flavour that’s a delightful as it’s nutritious. Figs add a burst of natural sweetness but are also a great source of fiber. Double the fun – these bites are the ultimate appie for you and your friends and a treat for your tummy!
preparation: Drain artichokes; finely chop. Place in bowl with cream cheese and dip mix; stir to evenly mix.
Slice figs in half lengthwise. Arrange on a platter. Top each with 1 tsp cheese mixture. Garnish with any or all of the toppings, if desired.
Insert a toothpick into each appy—they’ll be easier for guests to pick up.
tips: Swap figs for apple or pear slices. Brush with lemon water so they don’t turn brown.
Make it vegan: Use soy-based cream cheese-style spread.

Make Ahead Tip: Prep artichoke mixture, then using a heaping teaspoon as a guide, scoop portions onto a large plate. Cover and refrigerate up to 2 days. Cut figs, top with mixture, and garnish with desired toppings; assemble up to 2 hours before serving.
